results.summary: Swimmer Katie Ledecky was the darling of the 2012 London Olympics, and now she's looking to win more gold in Rio next year. She tells TODAY's Matt Lauer that she's unconcerned about the heavy expectations on her, saying that she's working with her coach to find new ways to improve even after winning five gold medals and breaking three world records just this month at the world championships in Russia.
results.seo_headline: Olympic swimmer Katie Ledecky: I'm 'enjoying working hard'

video.title: Olympic swimmer Katie Ledecky: I'm 'enjoying working hard'

results.summary: It's only a year until the Rio Olympics, where golf will re-enter the Games after more than 100 years. LPGA champ Cristie Kerr helps Matt Lauer and Carson Daly try a golf simulator. results.summary: Researchers at UCLA studied 1,100 young athletes and found those who needed leg surgery before college, particularly knee surgery, may have a higher risk of getting re-injured or needing more surgery.
results.seo_headline: Youth sports injuries could foreshadow later problems

video.title: Youth sports injuries could foreshadow later problems
video.description: Researchers at UCLA studied 1,100 young athletes and found those who needed leg surgery before college, particularly knee surgery, may have a higher risk of getting re-injured or needing more surgery.

results.headline: Youth sports injuries could foreshadow later problems

results.summary: Social media lit up with congratulations for Serena Williams after she won at Wimbledon Saturday, but when one Twitter user said Williams was "built like a man," Harry Potter author J. K. Rowling leaped to her defense. Dylan Dreyer reports from the Orange Room.
results.seo_headline: J. K. Rowling slams Serena Williams body shamer with perfect tweet

video.title: J. K. Rowling slams Serena Williams body shamer with perfect tweet
video.description: Social media lit up with congratulations for Serena Williams after she won at Wimbledon Saturday, but when one Twitter user said Williams was "built like a man," Harry Potter author J. K. Rowling leaped to her defense. Dylan Dreyer reports from the Orange Room.

results.headline: J. K. Rowling slams Serena Williams body shamer with perfect tweet

results.social_headline: J. K. Rowling slams Serena Williams body shamer with perfect tweet

results.summary: The coach of the FSU football team reportedly told his team Saturday that bar-hopping is now off limits after two of his players were charged with assaulting women. As NBC's Janet Shamlian reports, this is just the latest in a string of domestic violence incidents rocking football on the college and national level.
results.seo_headline: Bar-hopping now off limits for FSU players after string of violence

video.title: Bar-hopping now off limits for FSU players after string of violence

results.summary: As they prepare to participate in the historic ticker-tape parade honoring the World Cup-winning U.S. women's soccer team, members Hope Solo and Abby Wambach stop by the TODAY plaza. "If you have a dream, go after it," Wambach advises fans.
results.seo_headline: Soccer stars Hope Solo, Abby Wambach: Go after your dreams!

video.title: Soccer stars Hope Solo, Abby Wambach: Go after your dreams!
video.description: As they prepare to participate in the historic ticker-tape parade honoring the World Cup-winning U.S. women's soccer team, members Hope Solo and Abby Wambach stop by the TODAY plaza. "If you have a dream, go after it," Wambach advises fans.

results.headline: Soccer stars Hope Solo, Abby Wambach: Go after your dreams!
